info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 19 at 10:12AM EDT until August 22 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington NC
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina...
Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina...
Waccamaw River At Conway affecting Horry County.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in South Carolina...North Carolina...
Waccamaw River near Longs affecting Brunswick, Columbus and Horry Counties.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Lumber River near Lumberton.
* WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Flood waters will affect yards in the Pines area, Coxs Pond area, and along River Road. Additional residential property will be affected between the Pepsi plant and the river on the east side of Lumberton.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:05 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at water.noaa.gov/wfo/ilm .
The next statement will be issued by this morning.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON
